title: Did Ruth Bader Ginsburg Say ‘I Am Mentally Fit Enough to Serve Through the End of President Eisenhower’s Term?’
subtitle: The Associate Supreme Court Justice said she hopes to remain on the bench another five years.  And she knows who's president.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Ruth Bader Ginsburg said that she was mentally fit enough to serve through the end of President Eisenhower's term.
